channel.title: CVE Feed for RDesktop -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for RDesktop -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-15682|2024-08-05T00:56:21.899Z -- rdesktop -- rdesktop
item.description: RDesktop version 1.8.4 contains multiple out-of-bound access read vulnerabilities in its code, which results in a denial of service (DoS) condition. This attack appear to be exploitable via network connectivity. These issues have been fixed in version 1.8.5
